entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 3:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
